answers.answer: Im 38 weeks. 39 weeks on Monday and thats when my scheduled Elective C Section is. Its my 2nd one. 1st one was an emergency but C Sections are done at 39 weeks. Are you 39 weeks then?

They should do it bang on 39 weeks. Im in New Zealand and the info pamphlet i've got says 39 weeks for safety reasons which covers big babies etc. Enquire with your midwife i just think thats too late to be honest but i don't know how other countries operate but here its bang on 39 weeks if it's scheduled.

I have never had one. And that's what I thought too. Like the day I was 39 weeks I thought bam c section. But the doc said I was having it the 29 which is 2 days before my due date! Like what! Thank you for the information I appreciate it. I plan on calling in the am and discussing everything with them.

Some drs like to wait a bit past 39 weeks to allow for due date error. The scans can be wrong too especially later In pregnancy. Talk to your dr about any concerns that you have and if you don't agree with what your doctor says maybe ask if they can justify their reasoning. Good luck
My c section is on my due date 23rd... counting down the days :)

question: OK so this is my 3rd pregnancy, i am 38 weeks , baby has been measuring big since my anatomy scan at 20 weeks. I have been going weekly since 28 weeks because of bp, Gestational diabetes, and too much amniotic fluid. Now today doc told me that baby is just too large for me to deliver. And scheduled c- section for OCT. 29. @ 730am. :-/ I'm sad and scared my others were both natural births but both were under 8lbs this baby is already measuring 10 lbs. :-(
title: C-section
